name: ToHeaven
description:
Fight against the bad guys who are destroying everything in its pass. If you die you have an extra chance by collecting fragments of your conscience.

Sounds from CC0 Fresounds.com

Characters from quaternius

Graphics made by me in blender

UI from kenney cc0 assets

Ammo is picked up after dying, no time for pickups .

UI is bad, I didn't have enough time to put it decent,i'm very sorry for this.

By valianstrife

For Gamedev.tv gameJam 2022
